SEARCH
Package router

Class Router

java.lang.Object
router.Router
public final class Router extends Object
Setup primary stage, scene and all pages. Setting up primary stage includes app name, dimension, icons, etc.
Provide methods to navigate through pages.

  • Method Details

    • push

      public void push(AppPage pageKey)
      Navigate to a page and add that to router history.
      Parameters:
      pageKey - enum for destination page

    • pop

      public void pop()
      Go back to previous page. Has no effect on welcome page.

    • replace

      public void replace(AppPage pageKey)
      Navigate to a page, replacing current page in router history,
      Parameters:
      pageKey - enum for destination page

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Soft Reset, only used for testing

    • createInstance

      public static Router createInstance(javafx.stage.Stage stage) throws IOException
      Create a router instance. Do not call this method more than once!
      Parameters:
      stage -
      Returns:
      A singleton router instance
      Throws:
      IOException - May occur when loading resources of a some pages.

    • getInstance

      public static Router getInstance()
      Get current (a singleton) instance of a router. Required to access navigation methods.

      Example Usage 

       
 button.setOnAction(e -> {
     Router.getInstance().push(Page.GAME);
 });

    • getCurrentPage

      public AppPage getCurrentPage()
